titleStmt.title: James F. Robinson Jr. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG0868

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Office of the Quarter-Master General
FOR THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
Frankfort, Ky., Sept 1st, 1863.
To His Excellency
Thos. E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky;
Dear Sir;
I herewith tender you my resignation as Q. M. Genl of Kentucky;

Very Resp
Yr obt Servt
J. F. Robinson jr.

Qr. Mr. General
Resignation of J. F. Robinson Jr
accepted Sept 1st 1863.
Saml. G Suddarth appointed -- issue Commission
